Title: The World Council of Churches
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (created by), Joel Fields, Joseph Weisberg
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden, Costa Ronin
Plot: As Philip and Elizabeth grapple with a momentous decision, Tuan takes matters into his own hands in the Morozov operation. Back in Russia, Oleg's investigation collides with the realities of the Soviet system.
